text: CLOSE Saturday Night Live's Kate McKinnon makes Kellyanne Conway a scary clown, while the show weighs in on the Harvey Weinstein scandal. After initially side - stepping the Harvey Weinstein scandal, Saturday Night Live stepped up to address the issue this weekend. Leslie Jones as Viola Davis, Cecily Strong as Marion Cotillard and Kate McKinnon as Debette Goldry on'SNL.'( Photo : Will Heath, NBC ) In light of the allegations that Weinstein sexually assaulted and sexually harassed more than a dozen women, Leslie Jones ’ Viola Davis, Cecily Strong ’ s Marion Cotillard and Kate McKinnon ’ s no - holds - barred Debette Goldry held a roundtable to discuss their experiences with sexual predation in the film
